question_title: Who will win the 2025 Chilean presidential election?
search_query: Who will win the 2025 Chilean presidential election?

search_results.title: Chile elections: Communist Party candidate Jeanette Jara ...
search_results.text:
Chile is set for a run-off presidential vote next month, after Sunday's election failed to establish a clear winner. While vote counting is still underway, early results put leftist Jeannette Jara of the Communist Party narrowly ahead of the hard-right José Antonio Kast of the Republican Party. Neither candidate managed to secure 50% of votes, which is needed to claim victory. The election campaign was dominated by concerns over rising crime and immigration in Chile, with calls from the right for mass deportations. Speaking to supporters after polls closed, Jeanette Jara criticised her right wing opponents' fear-based campaigns.

# Chile heads to a presidential run-off between Jara and Kast
*Leftist ex-Labour Minister Jeannette Jara and far-right leader Jose Antonio Kast will go head-to-head in the December run-off.*
![Jeannette Jara, presidential candidate of the ruling leftist-coalition and member of the Communist Party, waves to supporters following early results in the presidential election, in Santiago, Chile November 16, 2025.](https://www.aljazeera.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/2025-11-17T000746Z_1185545281_RC20YHAG88QO_RTRMADP_3_CHILE-ELECTION-1763338377.jpg?resize=770%2C513&quality=80)

**Chile's presidential race heads to polarizing runoff****A closely fought first-round vote on Sunday has set up a showdown between a member of the Communist Party and an ultraconservative veteran politician, sharply polarizing the country.**
### [The Americas](https://www.npr.org/sections/latin-america/)
# Chile's polarized presidential election heads to a second round

By

metadata.title: Who will win the 2025 Chilean presidential election?
metadata.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as the individual who wins the [2025 Chilean presidential election](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_Chilean_general_election).
metadata.fine_print: The question resolves according to [official election results](https://elecciones.servel.cl/) or [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/faq/#definitions). If for any reason neither candidate is elected president of Chile before January 11, 2026, the question will be **annulled**.
